fields.name: Novice
fields.description: Finish any five actions successfully.
fields.label: NOV

fields.name: Three Peater
fields.description: Visited the site 3 days in a row.
fields.label: 3PT

fields.name: Six Peater
fields.description: Have visited the site six days in a row.
fields.label: 6PT

fields.name: Nine Peater
fields.description: Have visited the site nine days in a row.
fields.label: 9PT

fields.name: Energy Hat Trick
fields.description: The team has achieved DEGG three days in a row.
fields.label: HTR

fields.name: Super Committted
fields.description: Have committed to five commitments simultaneously.
fields.label: SPC

fields.name: Ultra Committed
fields.description: Have been committed to all possible commitments.
fields.label: ULC

fields.name: Level 1 Master
fields.description: Have completed all Level 1 non-event/excursion actions.
fields.label: LV1

fields.name: Level 2 Master
fields.description: Have completed all Level 2 non-event/excursion actions.
fields.label: LV2

fields.name: Level 3 Master
fields.description: Have completed all Level 3 non-event/excursion actions.
fields.label: LV3

fields.name: Level 4 Master
fields.description: Have completed all Level 4 non-event/excursion actions.
fields.label: LV4

fields.name: Super Social
fields.description: Have received the social bonus five times.
fields.label: SSC

fields.name: Super Referrer
fields.description: Have referred at least 10 new players to Kukui Cup.
fields.label: SRF

fields.name: Mega Referrer
fields.description: Have referred at least 20 new players to Kukui Cup.
fields.label: MRF

fields.name: Ultra Referrer
fields.description: Have referred at least 30 new players to Kukui Cup.
fields.label: URF

fields.name: White Hat
fields.description: Have reported one legitimate bug to administrators.
fields.hint: Found a bug?  Let us know!
fields.label: DBG

fields.name: Super Team
fields.description: At least 50% of possible team members have at least 50 points.
fields.label: STM

fields.name: Mega Team
fields.description: At least 75% of possible team members have at least 75 points.
fields.label: MTM

fields.name: Ultra Team
fields.description: At least 90% of possible team members have at least 90 points.
fields.label: UTM

fields.name: KC Champion
fields.description: Have been selected to champion the challenge.
fields.label: KCC
